ComicInfo.Title: The Eyeless Ones; Shadow of Death; Colony of Horror!; Beam of Terror
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Eyeless Ones: In the far future a group of scientists leave their planet for another where they hope to find signs of life. What they find are strange eyeless creatures who live underground.
Shadow of Death: A vampire falls in love.
Colony of Horror!: When their car runs out of gas, Jim and Mary Turner find themselves in a town of witches who plan to torture them.
Beam of Terror: Zachery and Wilmer worked in a lighthouse, but when the lighthouse was closed they decided to follow a treasure map they had found, but first Zachery kills Wilmer and hides his body in the lighthouse. Wilmer's ghost gets revenge by causing Zachery to wreck his ship on the rocks.
